\subsection*{Introduction}

\begin{par}
The Hille series is equivalent to a discretized Taylor series under the limit $$ \lim_{\Delta t \rightarrow 0} \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{t^n}{n! \Delta t^n} \mathrm{D}^n f(a) = f(a + t)$\$ for $t > 0$.
\end{par} \vspace{1em}
